body_html: @cswords thanks for you answer, now I'm learning to use an unofficial win pytorch a few of days and not in a hurry. I heard that the official version is under consideration and not sure, so I would like to know if the official version will be released later, of course I hope to use the official version in the future,Thanks for the great work of all people!
